terrapeer.vui.j3dui.control.actuators
Class MMTransformGroupPlugin

java.lang.Object
  terrapeer.vui.j3dui.control.actuators.ActuatorPlugin
      terrapeer.vui.j3dui.control.actuators.TransformGroupPlugin
          terrapeer.vui.j3dui.control.actuators.MMTransformGroupPlugin
public class MMTransformGroupPlugin
extends TransformGroupPlugin

(Multi-user Matrix TransformGroupPlugin) A transform group actuator plugin that assumes non-exclusive control of the target node and that the actuation state must be maintained by a matrix (Transform3D).

The target actuation value can not be clamped (i.e. it is not a vector).

To accomodate multiple users updateActuation() updates the actuation state relative to the target node's actual state rather than the actuator's internal state. As such updates require reading the target's transformation state, which is the least efficient form of actuator. This also means that the plugin loses its option to not preserve actuation state.
